headline.main: NAZI MEDDLING CHARGED; Free French Say They Seized Evidence in Syria

lead_paragraph: LONDON, Aug. 2 -- Secret reports said to indicate that the actual authors of Vichy's foreign policy are the German authorities in Berlin have been captured by Free French forces in Syria, according to an announcement today at General Charles de Gaulle's headquarters here.
abstract: Free French in London say documents seized in Syria show Berlin is author of Vichy foreign policy
